## bootstrap-typeahead package

## Classes

|  Class | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [TypeaheadControlValueAccessor](./bootstrap-typeahead.typeaheadcontrolvalueaccessor.md) | Value accessor for getting and setting values for typeahead |
|  [TypeaheadDirective](./bootstrap-typeahead.typeaheaddirective.md) | Directive that is used for creating autocomplete (typeahead.js) on input |
|  [TypeaheadModule](./bootstrap-typeahead.typeaheadmodule.md) | Module for bootstrap typeahead directives, components and pipes |
|  [TypeaheadTagsComponent](./bootstrap-typeahead.typeaheadtagscomponent.md) | Component that is used for creating autocomplete (typeahead.js) with tags |
|  [TypeaheadTagsControlValueAccessor](./bootstrap-typeahead.typeaheadtagscontrolvalueaccessor.md) | Value accessor for getting and setting values for typeahead tags |
|  [TypeaheadTagsModule](./bootstrap-typeahead.typeaheadtagsmodule.md) | Module for bootstrap typeahead tags directives, components and pipes |
